job description:
Reference: CPT002576-BB-1

Position Purpose:

Provide services to the company and the wider Group whereby valid, accurate and timeous business information is generated. This information must be reported on according to stakeholder's requirements that drive business decision making, operational excellence, business performance and service excellence.

Experience & Qualifications:

  • A relevant BComm or BSc degree.
  • A minimum of 18 months experience in a business intelligence role.
  • Technical expertise regarding data models, database design and development, data mining and business intelligence techniques.
  • Experience with SQL query (preferably SQL Server).
  • Business Analyst experience is preferable.
  • Fundamental knowledge of Data Warehousing is preferable.
  • Previous experience in the investment or financial industry will be advantageous.
  • Previous experience in the Service environment will be advantageous.
  • Good understanding of Agile project principles (eg. Scrum, Kanban) will be advantageous.
  • Experience in a mainstream reporting product suite (eg. Microsoft, QlickView, Cognos, Microstrategy, Business Objects, etc) will be advantageous.
  • Microsoft Office Suite, Excel (Advanced), Word, Powerpoint & Outlook.


Responsibilities:

Business Intelligence:
  • Structure information visually by applying appropriate data visualization techniques, tools and technologies according to leading practices.
  • Proactively analyse & develop an understanding of the data in order to gain valuable business insight.
  • Work closely with business stakeholders to identify & develop new areas for reporting or analysis.
  • Build prototypes to test business logic or visualizations & rapidly create context for new BI solutions.
  • Identify data quality issues & develop appropriate quality measures to track resolution progress.
Reporting:
  • Develop an understanding of the existing reports and BI solutions that are available.
  • Guide users in finding the most appropriate solution as well as providing context by highlighting how to use them correctly.
  • Deliver on ad-hoc reporting, data requests and analysis from business according to agreed priorities.


Competencies:

  • Strong analytical skills.
  • Ability to collect, organize, analyze and disseminate significant amounts of information.
  • Ability to pay attention to detail.
  • Ability to work under pressure.
  • Ability to build and maintain relationships with various stakeholders.
  • Good communication skills (verbal and written).
  • Self-motivated & goal driven.
  • Good interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to execute tasks thoroughly.
  • Strong client service orientation.
  • Ability and willingness to share knowledge share with colleagues.
  • Good time management skills.
Send a detailed copy of your CV to Bonita (bonita AT recru-it.co.za replace the AT with @)

Should you not be contacted within 7 days, please consider your application as unsuccessful.
